title: Pro Bike Check: Amity Rockwell’s Pinarello Grevil gravel bike
content:
When Amity Rockwell rolls her Pinarello Grevil into my garage, the downtube is splattered with mud. The cockpit is covered in dust. The seat pack under her saddle wears a solid coating of dried dirt, too. This Grevil gets ridden, and hard. If you don’t know Amity, you should: She’s the reigning champion of perhaps […]

The post Pro Bike Check: Amity Rockwell’s Pinarello Grevil gravel bike appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Dan Cavallari
